snippet: A white bison, a revered symbol by some American Indians, was born a month ago on a farm in Northwest Connecticut and will draw many visitors for its naming ceremony.
abstract: Rare white bison draws large crowds for its naming ceremony at Goshen, Conn, farm where it was born; white bison are so rare that each birth is viewed as akin to a historic event, and as a supremely auspicious message from the spirits for native Americans.
lead_paragraph: A white bison, a revered symbol by some American Indians, was born a month ago on a farm in Northwest Connecticut and will draw many visitors for its naming ceremony.

headline.seo: White Bison Is Born in a Connecticut Farm
headline.main: A Bison So Rare It’s Sacred
headline.print_headline: A Bison So Rare It’s Sacred
